title: Patch Notes
content: in and Deranged Force Curtain becoming active even if they weren't in combat near Gortash and even though they can only target Gortash. Fixed the Grenade Impellers and Incineration Casters becoming active as soon as Gortash entered combat and leaving combat as soon as Gortash left, even if they were in a different area (Gortash in the Audience Hall, turrets in his office). They no longer depend on Gortash and become active or inactive when a combat nearby starts or ends. Fixed Micromodron Force
